channel.title: K-19 Banner
channel.description:
Ok i need a banner Its Needas To Say "K-19 Labs"
and plus i need a logo
Backround needs to be black
And try to be creative :)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2007, 04:23:35 PM[/size][hr]Help Plz? [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Rule 5, please read the rules at http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html[/center]

item.title: K-19 Banner
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Star1 Dark_Star
item.description:
@Dark_Star1 wrote:

If you clean up your first topic like the following I will make one for you.

[b]Text on image:[/b][i]NAME, SOLGAN ECT. HERE[/i] [b]Render:[/b][i]ANY PERTICULAR RENDER HERE[/i] [b]Colors:[/b][i]SPECFIC COLOR HERE[/i] [b]Other:[/b][i]ANYTHING ELSE HERE[/i]

item.title: K-19 Banner
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:4, topic:143350”]Lawl. Sans?

So your saying you want a font that will make people cry themselves to sleep at night because no matter how kick ass the text or bg effects, or even the logo/render is, it’s still going to be a 1/10 because of the font? I really doubt anyone would want to make something that would cause such a detrimental effect on their portfolio.[/quote]

Sans fonts can be good looking also…

Helvetica Neue for one. The facebook logo as another.

Read full topic

item.title: K-19 Banner
item.dc:creator: @Ryan2 Ryan_
item.description:
@Ryan2 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:2, topic:143350”]Your request was marginally better than this one. Can you at least give more specifics?

What kind of logo? What is K-19 Labs? What font? Serif or Sans? Solid black background? Or just dark? It’s better that you give too much info that too little.

I think I’ll write a tut on gfx requests also.[/quote]

Im Sorry

I dont really care on the logo
Font Dosent Matter (whatever you think is best)
sans
and for the backround like a grayish darkesh theme

Read full topic
